name: Confined (candarush)
description:
A short horror game. No jumpscares. Hope you'll enjoy it.

A submission for A Dark Room jam.

External resources used:

  • PBR textures for ceiling, walls and a floor were downloaded from ambientcg.com and downscaled. 
  • All sounds were downloaded from freesound.org under the CC0 license, most have been heavily edited. 
  • Character rig animations were downloaded from mixamo.com.

Sorry for any bugs you might encounter.
